name: Ember's Adventure
description:
Ember's Adventure is a short 3D puzzle platformer created for my final game development graded unit.

Created in Unity using OOP coding practices.
My project brief was to make a game themed around time travel and was required to be suitable for ages 12 and up. 

I chose to create a single map with 2 unique time zones which Ember must travel between. Ember finds himself transported to an unfamiliar world with no idea how to get home. Collect all 50 gems across 2 time zones to gain access to the space portal which may get him home.

W - Forward
A - Move Left
S - Backward
D - Move Right
Mouse - Camera/Player Rotation
Space - Jump
Left Shift - Sprint
Left CTRL - Crouch
ESC - Pause Menu

There is also a tester questionnaire included in the zip file, please feel free to use it and leave me feedback in the comments below as it will help me with my final documentation.
